raw_comment: I notice that young women tend to reach out to or visit their parents more than young men but texting seems to be more frequent than actual speaking. I wonder why women tend to reach out to their parents or family more and why men maybe don't value these relationships as much? This relates to me and my community because as high school or college students progressively get older, they tend to lose contact with family and become wrapped up in their own separate lives. A catchy headline could be "Do women tend to care more about family connections and communication?"
ace_sentences: Many young women reach out to their parents more than many young men.
Many young women visit their parents more than many young men.
Texting is more frequent than speaking.
I wonder why many women reach out to their parents or their family more than many men.
I wonder why many men do not value these relationships as much as many women.
This relates to me and my community.
Many high school students get older over time.
Many college students get older over time.
As these students get older, they tend to lose contact with their family.
As these students get older, they tend to become wrapped up in their own separate lives.
The headline could be: Do women tend to care more about family connections and communication?
